text: Bavati yaqj~jO dEqvEByO&pA$krAmaqt tama#vaqrudhaqM nASa#knuvaqnta EqtA ya#j~jataqnUra#paSyaqn tA upA#dadhataq tABiqrvai tE yaqj~jamavA#rundhataq yad-ya#j~jataqnUru#paqdadhA#ti yaqj~jamEqva tABiqryaja#mAqnO&va# rundhEq traya#stri(gm) Sataqmupa# dadhAtiq traya#stri(gm)Saqdvai dEqvatA# dEqvatA# EqvAva# ruqndhE &thOq sAtmA#namEqvAgni(gm) sata#nuM cinutEq sAtmAq&muShmi#n ~MlOqkE - [  ] 2
